thread.title: World title within grasp for reigning F1 champ Hamilton
thread.title_full: World title within grasp for reigning F1 champ Hamilton

title: World title within grasp for reigning F1 champ Hamilton
text:
> Texas World title within grasp for reigning F1 champ Hamilton Mercedes driver Lewis Hamilton, of Britain, arrives for a news conference at the Formula One U.S. Grand Prix auto race at the Circuit of the Americas, Thursday, Oct. 22, 2015, in Austin, Texas. (AP Photo/John Locher)
